Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: the lack of feedback from teachers though trustworthy, does not allow much room for improvement. With AI, it allows me to add on to my learning and see where I can make improvements - when the feedback made sense and was trustworthy.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: inspired and encouraged to want to improve

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI at times was general and not relatable to the content. Teacher feedback can always be taken on board however sometimes assessments lacked comments and relied purely on numerical rubric
